articles.title: Asian Champions Trophy: Selvam Karthi leads five-star India in win over Malaysia - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: The goals were scored by Karthi, Hardik Singh, Harmanpreet Singh, Gurjant Singh, and Jugraj Singh
articles.content: India have climbed to the top of the Asian Champions Trophy table with a resounding 5-0 win over Malaysia on Sunday at the Mayor Radhakrishnan stadium, Chennai. Local boy Selvam Karthi opened the sco… [+3435 chars]

articles.title: New COVID Variant 'Eris' Spreading Rapidly In UK, Experts Sound Alarm - NDTV
articles.description: Eris or EG.5.1 was classified as a Covid variant on July 31 after UKHSA recorded its prevalence in the country due to rising cases internationally, particularly in Asia.
articles.content:
Eris is now the second most prevalent variant in the UK, after Arcturus
A new variant of COVID-19 is spreading rapidly across the United Kingdom, triggering alarm among health officials in the count… [+2438 chars]
